alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 3:55AM EST until December 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Rockingham and Strafford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lamprey River near Newmarket. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Bennett Road in Durham starts to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 9.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
